summary.span: 列表控件中的 对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects in a list control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 对象的集合。The class represents a collection of objects. 对象又表示列表控件中显示的项，例如 。The objects, in turn, represent the items displayed in list controls, such as the . 若要以编程方式 从列表控件中检索对象，请使用以下方法之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a list control, use one of following methods: - 使用 数组表示法，使用索引器从集合中获取单个。Use the indexer to get a single from the collection, using array notation. - 使用 方法可将集合的内容复制到 对象，然后可以使用该对象从集合中获取项。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection to a object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. - 使用 方法可创建实现的 对象，然后可以使用该对象从集合中获取项。Use the method to create a implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. - 使用 `foreach` (c # ) 或 `For Each` (Visual Basic) 来循环访问集合。Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. 属性指定集合中的总项数，并且通常用于确定集合的上限。The property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 您可以使用和方法在集合中添加和移除项 。You can add and remove items from the collection by using the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 对象，将项添加到集合，以及从集合中移除项。The following code example demonstrates creating objects, adding items to the collections, and removing items from the collections. 在此示例中，将名为的控件用作名为的 `listBoxData` 控件的数据源 `ListBox1` ，并将调用的用作 控件的 `ddBoxData` 数据源 `DropDownList1` 。In the example, the named `listBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `ListBox1`, and the called `ddBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `DropDownList1`. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListItemCollectionSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollectionSample/CS/listitemcollection2cs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListItemCollectionSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollectionSample/VB/listitemcollection2vb.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可在集合中搜索 具有 等于参数指定的文本的属性 `text` 。Use the method to search the collection for a with a property that equals text specified by the `text` parameter. 此方法执行区分大小写和不区分区域性的比较。This method performs a case-sensitive and culture-insensitive comparison. 此方法不执行部分搜索或通配符搜索。This method does not do partial searches or wildcard searches. 如果使用此条件在集合中找不到某个项， `null` 则返回。If an item is not found in the collection using this criteria, `null` is returned. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ListItemCollection_Search#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollection_Search/CS/listitemcollection_search.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[ListItemCollection_Search#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollection_Search/VB/listitemcollection_search.vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可 从集合中删除对象。Use the method to remove a object from the collection. 此方法的实现将 使用参数中的文本创建一个对象 `item` ，然后将其 从集合中移除。This implementation of the method creates a object using the text in the `item` parameter and then removes this from the collection. 指定的 `item` 参数必须与 现有对象的属性相匹配 ，否则将不会从集合中移除任何项。The specified `item` parameter must match the property of an existing object, or no item is removed from the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 类的方法 。The following example demonstrates the method of the class. 网页包含一个控件，其中包含 一些列表项和一个 名为的控件 `Delete` 。The Web page contains a control with some list items in it and a control named `Delete`. 用户输入要删除到控件中的项的文本 。The user enters the text of the item to delete into the control. 控件的事件处理程序 `Button1` 从对象中删除选定项 ，因此从控件中删除该项 。The event handler of the `Button1` control deletes the selected item from the object and therefore from the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法 从集合中移除。Use the method to remove a from the collection. 此方法的实现采用 参数指定的， `item` 并将其从集合中移除。This implementation of the method takes the specified by the `item` parameter and removes it from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 对象，将项添加到集合，以及从集合中移除项。The following code example demonstrates creating objects, adding items to the collections, and removing items from the collections. 在此示例中，将名为的控件用作名为的 `listBoxData` 控件的数据源 `ListBox1` ，并将调用的用作 控件的 `ddBoxData` 数据源 `DropDownList1` 。In the example, the named `listBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `ListBox1`, and the called `ddBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `DropDownList1`. 若要在完全可用的示例中查看此代码，请参阅 类主题。To view this code in a fully working example, see the class topic.
